io.micronaut.core.type

Interface Argument<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The argument type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotatedElement, AnnotationMetadataProvider, AnnotationSource, Named, TypeVariableResolver
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArgumentValue<V>, MutableArgumentValue<V>

    public interface Argument<T>
extends AnnotationSource, TypeVariableResolver, Named, AnnotationMetadataProvider
    Represents an argument to a method or constructor or type.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Default Object argument.
      static Argument[] ZERO_ARGUMENTS
      Constant representing zero arguments.

      • getName

        String getName()

        getName in interface Named
        Returns:
        The name of the argument

      • getType

        Class<T> getType()
        Returns:
        The type of the argument

      • getQualifier

        Annotation getQualifier()
        Returns:
        The qualifier or null if there is none

      • equalsType

        boolean equalsType(Argument<?> other)
        Whether the types are equivalent. The regular Object.equals(Object) implementation includes the argument name within the comparison so this method offers a variation that just compares types.
        Parameters:
        other - The type type
        Returns:
        True if they are equal

      • typeHashCode

        int typeHashCode()
        The hash code including only the types. The regular Object.hashCode() implementation includes the argument name within the comparison so this method offers a variation that just compares types.
        Returns:
        The type hash code

        static Class[] toClassArray(Argument... arguments)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The class array
